meaningMnemonic: If you manage to make <kanji>all</kanji> <kanji>part</kanji>s of something work together you worked <vocabulary>very</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>extremely</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>considerably</vocabulary> hard to do it. Doing all of anything is hard so lots of work had to happen.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
